entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 8:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries changing to a few rain showers and flurries late this evening then to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
